 BREAKING: Charlie Kirk has died of his injuries, per preliminary information  @Middle_East_Spectator
Charlie has said and supported some disgusting things, but cheering on political violence is just as bad. There‚Äôs gonna be a lot of hate over the next few weeks. This can never be the answer.
Charlie has said and supported some disgusting things, but cheering on political violence is just as bad. There‚Äôs gonna be a lot of hate over the next few weeks. This can never be the answer.
It‚Äôs the policy makers with blood on their hands, not idiot bootlickers like Charlie.
A large fire is burning in Vinnytsia City after it was hit by 1-2 Kh-101 cruise missiles this morning. What exactly was hit is currently unknown, but we may get FIRMS data showing active fires.

The target for the Russian missile strike on Vinnytsia yesterday seems to have been the Vinnytsia Aircraft Repair Plant.
Coordinates: 49.229771, 28.539321

The target for the Russian missile strike on Vinnytsia yesterday seems to have been the Vinnytsia Aircraft Repair Plant.
Coordinates: 49.229771, 28.539321

I've geolocated some of the footage from the Assassination of Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University.
Before the shooting, the assassin was seen atop the roof of the Career Development Center at 40.278201, -111.7127806.
After the shooting, the assassin was seen running from his position on that same rooftop. 
When factoring in where Charlie Kirk was sitting (~40.277531, -111.714015), the length of the shot comes out to approximately 128 metres.
Ballistic missile launch from Yemen to southern Israel.
Sirens in the Negev, southern Israel
Sirens in the Negev, southern Israel
Interceptor launch
Interceptor launch
The ballistic missile was intercepted.
MiG-31K airborne. Threat of Kinzhal launches.
MiG-31K airborne. Threat of Kinzhal launches.
Carrying out a training mission in Tambov Oblast.

Russian forces have captured the village of Sosnivka, Pokrovske direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~206.
Total land area: ~1.00km¬≤

Russian forces have captured the village of Novomykolaivka, Pokrovske direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~155.
Total land area: ~0.99 km¬≤.
The IDF confirmed that four Israeli soldiers were killed in the ambush on an Israeli tank in Jabalia, Northern Gaza, yesterday.

The Al-Qassam Brigades has published footage showing their attack on an Israeli tank on an Israeli Merkava tank in the centre of Jabalia City, northern Gaza. 
One of the fighters emerges from a destroyed building and runs towards the tank, hurling an IED into the open commander's hatch, killing all four Israeli soldiers inside and destroying the tank. Notably, this event took place in a completely flattened part of Jabalia, confirming Hamas' continued presence in the area.

I've geolocated some of the footage from the Assassination of Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University.  Before the shooting, the assassin was seen atop the roof of the Career Development Center at 40.278201, -111.7127806.  After the shooting, the assassin was‚Ä¶

Charlie Kirk Assassination Update:
By piecing together footage and aligning key moments from the videos, I made an approximate timeline of events from when the bullet was fired and have plotted it on a map. 
The shooter began fleeing just 3 seconds after Charlie Kirk was hit. 
After running for approximately 90 metres, he was at the other end of the building ~39 seconds after Charlie was hit. 
He then dropped down from the roof and ran an additional ~65 metres in approximately 46 seconds, before crossing Campus Drive 1 minute 25 seconds after Charlie was hit. It's currently unknown where he went from there.

Charlie Kirk Assassination Update:  By piecing together footage and aligning key moments from the videos, I made an approximate timeline of events from when the bullet was fired and have plotted it on a map.   The shooter began fleeing just 3 seconds after‚Ä¶

Some CCTV footage from a nearby house allowed me to extend the shooter's path, but I can't 100% guarantee the accuracy of this part. 
Hopefully some more info will surface in the next 24 hours, so I can make a more definitive update.

In the Pokrovske direction, Russian forces continued to advance in the area of the Zaporizhzhia-Dnipropetrovsk regional border, and have captured the village of Novomykolaivka.
Russian forces advanced from the treelines north of Obratne, reaching a tributary of the Yanchur River, and crossing over into the eastern houses of Novomykolaivka. They were able to capture the village relatively quickly, and expanded their zone of control to the treelines north and south of it. They also advanced from the village of Zaporizke and captured the treeline to the southwest. 
+ ~6.66 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

In the Pokrovske direction, Russian forces continued to advance deeper into Dnipropetrovsk Oblast and have completed the capture of Sosnivka.
After breaking through Ukrainian positions in the direction of Velykomykhailivka and repelling Ukrainian counterattacks, Russian forces resumed their assault operations in Sosnivka and established control over the northern part of the village which was previously in the grey zone. 
Additionally, they advanced down a treeline northwest of the village and pushed down the gulley south of the village. 
+ ~1.90 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

In the Pokrovsk direction, Russian forces continued to advance and have captured new positions southeast of Pokrovsk.
Russian forces advanced to the treeline running east of Novoukrainka, and established control over most of it. They also captured a section of the Lysivka - Novopavlivka Road, and entered the western outskirts of Lysivka from the forest. 
+ ~0.85 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

In the Dobropillya direction, both Russian and Ukrainian forces advanced, with Ukrainian forces continuing to recapture large areas northeast of Pokrovsk.
Ukrainian forces advanced in two areas. In the northeast, after Russian assault operations stalled, they advanced from the area of Sofiivka towards Poltavka and Rusyn Yar, recapturing positions in several different treelines and along two gulleys. 
To the southwest, Ukrainian forces advanced south and southeast from Volodymyrivka, capturing positions in three different treelines, and entering the northern houses of Novotoretske. Additionally, fighting continues for Pankivka, where the whole village is in the grey zone. 
Meanwhile, Russian forces continued to expand the western flank of their salient to Kucheriv Yar, and re-entered the village of Nove Shakhove, capturing positions in its eastern houses. Ukrainian forces continued attempts to enter Kucheriv Yar from the north. 
+ ~13.39 km¬≤ in favour of Ukraine.
+ ~1.52 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.
